mean_en: to change (a written work) by removing parts that might offend people
word_etyma: ex出，出去+purg冲洗+ate使之成...→冲洗出来→净化；删去
short_phrase: expurgate sth. from the censored letters
sentence: On TV, some dirty words are expurgated and you can only hear the "bleep".
sentence_trans: 电视节目上的一些脏字会被删去，你会听见“哔”的一声。
